g.text: A structured SDLC methodology where agents write tests, implement features,
review code, and deploy ‚Äî while you architect, decide, and verify.
From interview to deployment in four steps
a test before any code exists.
Every feature starts as a spec. Every line of code traces to an approved
requirement. No more "that's not what I asked for."
Tests before every line of code
Strict TDD with independent verification. Sub-agents write tests,
Agents that get smarter over time
Knowledge persists across projects. Patterns discovered on Project A
automatically inform Project B. No one repeats the same mistake.
POC gets zero ceremony. GA gets exhaustive verification. The maturity
dial governs all ADD behavior ‚Äî one control for everything.
